summary: This API offers the ability to get the product of the campaign fulfillment status for creators who added partner campaign products to their showcase
description:
This API offers the ability to get the product of the campaign fulfillment status for creators who added partner campaign products to their showcase. For details of a specified product involved in an affiliated campaign, use Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Fulfillment Status Info gateway.​ Version
202501
  
API Testing Tool
​

query.description: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.​
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders. ​
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.​
The number of results to be returned per page. Valid range: 1-50.​
An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the next_page_token from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.​

header.description: The partner access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 3. Follow this guide to get partner access_token.​

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.​
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.​

children.description: The total count of products included in the specified campaign.​
A list of objects representing campaign product statistics.​
The time at which the product data was last updated, in Unix epoch format.​
The number of products sold in the campaign.​
The total number of creators associated with the campaign.​
The number of the creators involved in the campaign.​ ​
The total number of samples requested by all creators associated with the campaign. ​
An object representing the details for the product associated with the campaign.​
The product identifier.​
The product status. This is an enumerated type with values:​ - PRODUCT_UNSPECIFIED​ - PRODUCT_PENDING​ - PRODUCT_APPROVED​ - PRODUCT_REJECTED​ - PRODUCT_PENDING_CLOSED​ - PRODUCT_CLOSED​ ​
The product name.​
The total number of products in stock.​

The commission rate of the partner plan. It is the sum of the creator_commission_rate and partner_commission_rate. The value is in hundredths of a percent. For example, a value of 1000 means 10.00%.​ ​
The commission rate for the creator in the partner plan. The value is in hundredths of a percent. For example, a value of 1000 means 10.00%.​
The commission rate for the partner in the partner plan. The value is in hundredths of a percent. For example, a value of 1000 means 10.00%.​ ​
The commission rate for open collaboration. The value is in hundredths of a percent. For example, a value of 1000 means 10.00%.​ ​
The product price.​
The minimum offered price of the product.​
The maximum offered price of the product.​
The currency code for the maximum and minimum offered price for the product.​
An object representing the product thumbnail.​
The base URI of the product.​
A list of URLs for each image associated with the product.​
Key performance indicators for the product.​
The total number of paid orders. paid_order_num = actual_order_num + {number of paid but returned orders}​ ​
The actual number of paid orders. ​
The total payment amount corresponding to paid_order_num.​ ​
GMV, the total payment amount corresponding to actual_order_num.​ ​
The partner commission amount corresponding to paid_order_num.​ ​
The partner commission amount corresponding to actual_order_num.​ ​
The number of creators credited with at least one product sale.​
The total number of creators collaborating on the campaign.​
The number of creators involved in the partner plan.​ ​
The total number of creators that applied for a sample.​
next page query token​
